name: Sparky
descriptions: Sparky is a non-hostile sentry bot found inside the mobile base crawler in 2277.
Sparky is a Personal Automated Lackey (P.A.L.) owned by Stiggs, an Enclave engineer who works at the mobile base crawler. He is one of two robots owned by Stiggs, the other being Hoover.
It has a black paint job with red eye lighting, like most of the other robots in the crawler.
Sparky appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.
PC Sometimes, Sparky will not appear at all. This can also happen to Hoover.
